name: LoanShark (Mit64)
description:
LoanShark

Mark the Shark needs coins in order to supply for his shark Wife and shark children. However, nasty underwater mines leftover from World War 2 keep getting in his way. Help Mark provide for his family and avoid injury by collecting coins and dodging mines under the sea.

Controls:

Use "WASD" to move

Features:
  • Side Scroller 
  • Score tracking
  • Relaxing Gameplay
  • Reset button

This is a student project for INFSCI1061 at the University of Pittsburgh
